name: Merchant Tycoon Empire
description: Build a vast trading empire and become the ultimate merchant tycoon!
Master the art of commerce and control the flow of goods across the land.

objectives.start_small_business: Start your first small trading business
objectives.corner_market: Corner the market on rare goods

dialogs.start: Every great fortune begins with a single trade. Do you have what it takes?
dialogs.growth: Your business is growing! But remember, expansion requires careful planning.
dialogs.competition: Other merchants are taking notice. Competition will be fierce.
dialogs.success: Your trading empire spans continents! Few have achieved such success.
dialogs.tycoon: You've become a legend in the merchant world!
dialogs.complete: Congratulations, Merchant Tycoon! Your empire will be remembered for ages!
